article_title: Joplin's Landmark Hospital seeks to build $10 million addition

article_metadata.author: Emily Younker eyounker@joplinglobe.com

og.description: Landmark Hospital in Joplin is embarking on a campaign to both expand its services in the area and to try to turn around the sometimes negative reputation that it has
